attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: Sets whether the tooltip is visible or not

attributes.name: anchor
attributes.description: The HTML ID of the element the tooltip is positioned relative to

attributes.name: delay
attributes.description: The delay in milliseconds before a tooltip is shown after a hover event

attributes.name: auto-update-mode
attributes.description: Controls when the tooltip updates its position.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Controls the placement of the tooltip relative to the configured 'Anchor ID'

attributes.name: horizontal-viewport-lock
attributes.description: Controls if the tooltip will always remain fully in the viewport on the horizontal axis

attributes.name: vertical-viewport-lock
attributes.description: Controls if the tooltip will always remain fully in the viewport on the vertical axis
